title: Top Expert Tips for Growing Your Hair for Your Wedding Day
text: February 21, 2017 Getty Images When it comes to getting wedding day hair inspiration, must of us would turn to Pinterest in a second. It's loaded with wedding hair ideas for practically every type of bride. But getting hair inspiration and actually having perfect hair are two separate things. Of course we all want healthy hair for the biggest day of our life, but how do we get it? We asked Matrix SoColor celebrity stylist George Papanikolas and Cristina B., a stylist at Rita Hazan Salon in New York City to provide the best tips for growing your hair for your special day. Oh and here's a special bonus tip: Papanikolas suggests washing your hair the day before your wedding so it has more texture for the style to hold. You May Also Like Hair Lorde Has a Lob for Her New Album Release -- “Keep heat styling to a minimum. The less heat on the hair, the better the condition and the longer it will grow.” -George Papanikolas “I usually recommend waiting as long as possible to trim your hair so it can grow as long as it can.” -Cristina B. “Space out highlight appointments to no sooner than three months apart. Just like heat styling , the less bleach on the hair the better the condition it will be. And in turn, the longer it will grow.” -George Papanikolas “A healthy diet with lots of veggies, fish and whole grains. Also iron is very important. I always see great results when iron is added to a well-balanced diet.” -Cristina B. More must-read stories on mastering perfect wedding day hair:
